name: Only one pool
description:
CONTROLS:

A&D to move, SPACE to jump, S to pick up weapons, Left Shift to change to your secondary weapon, ESC to open the pause menu, aim gun with your mouse cursor and shoot by clicking (or holding your click down in some cases)

[Submission for the GMTK 2019 Game Jam]

My first ever participation in a larger game jam, i thought i'd take the chance to try my hand at stuff i've never really worked with before. When the theme was revealed the idea of having a shared resource as the main mechanic was interesting to me. I worked towards a Super Crate Box esque game where the enemies drop Powerups, which affect both the enemies and the player. picking up a bonus to speed will make all the enemies move faster as well etc. 

All this gave me a nice chance to try my hand at a 2D game, which i haven't really done before, and i played around with a lot of the new preview packages from unity. Besides that i made the pixelart, and even some animations (of which i'm pretty proud!)
